contentObject.content: Walmart Inc. (WMT) announced the launch of the Dave and Jenny Marrs Collection for Better Homes & Gardens collection. The collection includes 30 outdoor furniture and d√©cor items, most available on Tuesday. Items include a teak outdoor dining table for $997, decorative pillows for about $30 and planters in a range of sizes priced from about $12 to $49. Walmart stock has run up 13.2% over the last year.
